/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly red brick, punctuated by large windows that reflect the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is devoid of any cars or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the otherwise busy cityscape.
